```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(Biostrings)
```


```{r}
ZNF140_cds <- rtracklayer::import("data/ZNF140_refseq_protein.fasta", format="fasta", type="AA") %>% as.character()

ZNF140 <- tibble(Specie = names(ZNF140_cds), Sequence=ZNF140_cds) %>%
  mutate(Contact_Residues = findFingers(Sequence) %>% getContactResidues()) %>%
  select(Specie, Contact_Residues)

ZNF140
```
